position.name: Full Stack Developer
jobResponsible: Develop and maintain in house products
Facilitate Scrum and Collaboration : Lead daily scrum meetings, clean code sessions, and pair programming with fellow developers.
Code Review : Conduct reviews code to ensure code quality, maintainability, and best practices.
Cross-Functional Team Collaboration : Partner with a diverse team to define and release new features across mobile apps, web, and backend applications in an agile setting.

description: Achievement Corporation (アチーブメント株式会社) is a Tokyo-based consulting and personal development firm founded in 1987. With a strong focus on both individual growth and organizational transformation, the company delivers evidence-based training, coaching, and leadership development programs. By combining psychological theory with practical tools, Achievement Corporation helps clients improve performance, achieve goals, and build lasting success. Its mission is to support people in realizing their full potential—professionally and personally—through structured, results-driven approaches trusted by business leaders, educators, and athletes across Japan.

position.name: Full Stack Developer

description: BiKay is a global IT start-up (French Tech Cambodge community), founded in 2013 by 2 French IT engineers located in Phnom Penh. Bikay provides IT services & consulting to their clients & partners (outsourcing with its clients in France) in web development, mobile/web applications, and business solutions.

position.name: Lead Mobile Developer
position.description: Elephant is a visual company established through Kirirom Institute of Technology's internship program. We are responsible for developing mobile applications and systems for both Kirirom Institute of Technology and vKirirom Pine Resort.

Basic UX/UI Design : Design fundamental UX/UI elements to enhance the user experience.
Requirement Gathering : Collect requirements from management and translate them into technical specifications.
Requirement Analysis : Analyze requirements and convert them into technical designs.
Weekly Meeting with management : Conduct weekly meetings with senior management to report project progress and outline next steps.
Bug Fixing and Performance Optimization :  Identify and resolve bugs while improving overall application performance.
Task management : Oversee task assignments and delegate responsibilities to developers.
Team meeting : Discuss project progress, update task statuses, assist developers with bug fixes, and assign new tasks.
Code Review : Conduct reviews code to ensure code quality, maintainability, and best practices.
Cross-Functional Team Collaboration : Work with a diverse team to define, develop, and release new features across mobile apps, web platforms, and backend applications within an agile environment.
Release Management : Oversee and manage application releases to the App Store and Google Play Store.
